comment: Meet Scott Hammond, Joyent CEO who politically deplatformed Gab. If you see him let him know how you feel. Joyent is owned by Samsung. I hereby declare a boycott of Samsung products and services until they fire Hammond. Complain herefficeofthepresident.samsung.com
amr:
# ::snt Meet Scott Hammond, Joyent CEO who politically deplatformed Gab. If you see him let him know how you feel. Joyent is owned by Samsung. I hereby declare a boycott of Samsung products and services until they fire Hammond. Complain herefficeofthepresident.samsung.com
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / meet-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Scott"
                        :op2 "Hammond")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / company
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Joyent"))
                        :ARG2 (o / officer
                              :mod (c2 / chief)
                              :mod (e / executive)))
                  :ARG0-of (d / deplatform-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Gab"))
                        :manner (p3 / politics))))
      :snt2 (h2 / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (l / let-know-07
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (h3 / he)
                  :ARG2 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (f / feel-01
                              :ARG0 y2)))
            :ARG2 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 p))
      :snt3 (o2 / own-01
            :ARG0 (c3 / company
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Samsung"))
            :ARG1 (c4 / company
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Joyent")))
      :snt4 (d2 / declare-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (b / boycott-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p4 / product
                              :poss (c5 / company
                                    :name (n6 / name
                                          :op1 "Samsung")))
                        :op2 (s2 / serve-01
                              :ARG0 c5))
                  :time (u / until
                        :op1 (f2 / fire-02
                              :ARG0 c5
                              :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                    :name (n7 / name
                                          :op1 "Hammer")))))
            :mod (h4 / hereby)
            :medium (u2 / url-entity
                  :value "www.samsung.com")))

comment: Hating someone based on their religion or sexual preference when they're not causing harm to others, doesn't make any sense.
amr:
# ::snt Hating someone based on their religion or sexual preference when they're not causing harm to others, doesn't make any sense.
(s / sense-02
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (h / hate-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / someone)
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (o / or
                        :op1 (r / religion
                              :poss s2)
                        :op2 (p / prefer-01
                              :ARG0 s2
                              :manner (s3 / sex))))
            :time (h2 / harm-01

                  :ARG0 s2
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :mod (o2 / other))))
